article_title: New Album in time for Easter From Chart-Topping Sisters Crowned Billboard’s #1 Classical Traditional Artist For Third Straight Year
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

New York – Benedictines of Mary return with their contemplative, strikingly beautiful and spiritually uplifting new recording, Easter at Ephesus, to be released March 3, 2015 on De Montfort Music/Decca. The 27-track album features a seasonal array of glorious chants and exhilarating hymns for Eastertide with the unearthly and highly acclaimed voices of the nuns that have […]
